comments.raw_text: HTML spec removes those HTML4 features
comments.text: HTML spec removes those HTML4 features

comments.author: bugs@pettay.fi
comments.text:
Created attachment 570509
WIP

But I'm not actually sure we can remove .coords and .shape this easily from
anchor. At least there should be a warning.

And, using <a> in a map is kind of useful. Perhaps it should be
added back to html(5). Afaik, it hasn't been discussed widely whether HTML
should or should not support <a> inside <map>
comments.creator: bugs@pettay.fi

If you have questions, please contact :mdaly.
